nodes.text: Danadine was a world located in the Danadine system, a part of the Outer Rim Territories' Dail sector. Around 10 ABY, it served as the homeworld of Relekin Confidential, a collection agency that constituted a part of the Tenloss Syndicate.

Danadine was mentioned in the 1994 sourcebook Galaxy Guide 11: Criminal Organizations, written by Rick D. Stuart for use with West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Danadine system, and therefore Danadine itself, in grid square Q-18.
